# Toggle Component

### Toggle

**Exports:**
- `Toggle` - Toggle button component

**Usage:**
```svelte
<script lang="ts">
	import { Toggle } from 'kampsy-ui';

	let checked = $state(false);
	let checked2 = $state(true);
</script>

<div class="space-y-4">
	<div class="w-full">
		<Toggle aria-label="Enable Firewall" {checked} />
	</div>
	<div class="w-full">
		<Toggle aria-label="Enable Firewall" checked={checked2} />
	</div>
</div>
```

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D kampsy-ui@latest
```

## Documentation

Visit http://ui.kampsy.xyz/toggle for full documentation and examples.
